data.title: US State Department Trafficking in Persons Report downgrades 18 countries
data.snippet: The annual TIP report places 18 nations on its watch list for failing to meet minimum standards in combating human trafficking.

data.title: Southeast Asian cyber scam compounds linked to trafficking of 100,000+ workers
data.snippet: UN investigators estimate over 100,000 people from across Asia have been trafficked into forced labor in online scam operations in Myanmar and Cambodia.

data.title: India's anti-trafficking bill aims to create national investigation agency
data.snippet: The proposed legislation would establish a dedicated national agency to investigate cross-border trafficking networks operating across Indian states.

data.title: UK Modern Slavery Act under review after reports reveal enforcement gaps
data.snippet: A parliamentary review finds that fewer than 1% of businesses required to file modern slavery statements face any enforcement action.

data.title: AI-powered tools help NGOs identify trafficking victims on social media
data.snippet: Machine learning algorithms trained to detect coded language used by traffickers are helping organizations identify potential victims online.
